reviewText: Fascinating series of cartoons about a man who came to the U.S. from the Dominican Republic as a child, seemingly back in the 1970's or perhaps during the early 1980's-  He tells his own story through his own words, his own illustrations-  He manages to explore some very serious topics and some serious situations humorously too, which is not easy to do, but because he's telling his own story and he's recounting his own memories, he manages to make it work very well
